summary: Completed testing of Production Control System color migration from blue to green. Frontend successfully displays green colors, backend APIs work locally but external URL routing needs configuration.

critical_bugs.issue: External backend URL returns 404 for all /api/ endpoints
critical_bugs.impact: Frontend cannot connect to backend in production environment

integration_issues.issue: Cannot authenticate due to backend URL routing issue

passed_tests: Login page loads with correct green background (#166534, #15803d)
Submit button displays green gradient correctly
All form elements present and functional
Backend API endpoints work locally (100% success rate)
Color migration from blue to green completed successfully
success_percentage: Frontend: 95% (colors and UI working, integration blocked by backend URL), Backend: 100% (locally)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix external backend URL routing - the backend works locally on localhost:8001 but the external URL (https://agent-env-f4215baf-403f-4f92-b675-b0234f39956d-backend.stage-preview.emergentagent.com) returns 404 for all /api/ endpoints. This is likely a Kubernetes ingress or routing configuration issue.
